job.title: Machine Learning Graphics Engineer
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtsummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtapple is seeking a ml graphics engineer who is exceptionally creative and innovative to join a team of industryleading developers in their pursuit of innovative algorithms for d human visualization design and implement ml graphics workflows and procedural systems while working closely with a small team in a collaborative nature be forwardthinking in a fast paced startup environment with a drive to enable a team to scale productively and efficiently the individual should be able to collaborate with multifunctional teams to develop algorithms and generate data to build software solutions for apples next generation productsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtkey qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtexcellent programming skills in python andor cc in a linuxand or macos environmentltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtsolid foundation in d geometry data structures and algorithms and linear algebraltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtextensive knowledge of general computer vision and deep learningltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtsolid understanding and experience of deep generative modelsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtunderstanding of physicsbased simulation methodsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtexcellent problem solving critical thinking and communication skillsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtdescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtapple makes the newest technologies accessible to create amazing user experiences you will have the opportunity to work in a multifunctional team to develop tools and algorithms for human visualization you will need a keen understanding and deep experience in d human development photogrammetry shading rigging simulation ml and pipelines your work will help synthetic human generation and the data will be essential to build advanced software solutionsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggteducation ampamp experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtphd in computer science machine learning computer vision or related field or ms in related fieldltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtrole number ltbrgtltbrgt
